Measuring 18 inch in length and 5 inch in width, this tall French chef appears different because it... More
The French Chef with Chalkboard makes a perfect decor for your home or restaurant. Measuring 18 inch in length and 5 inch in width, this tall French chef appears different because it carries a big chalkboard in his hands. The chalkboard is placed along the legs of the statue, so it can display the message clearly to the audience. Place it on the corner table and post the message to your guests in a stylish manner. The French Chef with Chalkboard would be an ideal showpiece in your dining room, especially on occasions like Thanksgiving. Write your message to your dear ones on the spacious chalkboard and display it in your party area. This tall French chef is made of polystone. It differs from other statues because it carries an air of gravity and so it makes the best gift for occasions like Thanksgiving. This French chef, however, also finds its use in restaurants- big or small. This 24x36 chalkboard sidewalk sign is double-sided! The black write-on boards work with stick chalk, wet-erase and liquid chalk markers! This A-frame chalkboard sidewalk sign is 34.5 inches tall. Perfect for use outside of a restaurant or a retail store! This chalkboard sidewalk sign is a great way to increase the amount of traffic into your business. Each of these write-on blackboards includes two 24" x 28" writable areas. This chalkboard sidewalk sign that is double-sided, can effectively communicate your messages to passersby. Passersby can see the promotions while they are walking from either direction. Your messages can be written on the chalkboard sidewalk sign using stick chalks, wet-erase and liquid chalk markers. Customers can also easily wipe off the messages by using a damp or wet cloth. This write-on blackboard, chalkboard sidewalk sign that has a contemporary design can be used by various businesses. They can be used to communicate current sales, menu listings or to announce upcoming events. This restaurant blackboard, a-frame chalkboard sidewalk sign is made from rubber wood with a black finish profile. Therefore, this write-on board is only meant for use indoors. However, they can also be used outdoors with limitations. This chalkboard sidewalk sign that is foldable is equipped with hinges at the top to allow users to fold them flat for easy storage and mobility. Each write-on board also comes with a chain at the bottom to stop the unit from angling back too far. This chalkboard sidewalk sign, a-frame black board and other write-on blackboard is commonly seen in places like restaurants, bars, cafes, schools and stores. These restaurant menu displays are available in a brown and teak finish as well. Buy this black chalkboard sidewalk sign at an affordable price and place them in front of your business to start attracting customers! (Please Note: These menu chalk boards are designed for indoor use only. However, they can be used outdoors under ideal weather conditions.) Click here to find out How to Clean your Chalkboards. This menu chalkboard, sidewalk chalkboard is a very effective way to gain the attention of potential customers, simply by placing the unit outside of your business. Users can create and write their own messages and advertisements on these side walk signs using stick chalk, wet-erase or liquid chalk markers (sold separately). These dual-sided signs can display two different messages back to back. This sidewalk chalkboard, a-frame black board that has a classic design, is therefore ideal for use by a variety of businesses. This chalk board is often used within restaurants and delis, displaying "Menu of the Day" or "Drinks Specials". Schools often use this sidewalk chalkboard that is foldable as a teaching tool to educate children. Retail stores can also use these signs to display "Clearance Events", "Sale Today" or "Buy One, Get 1 Free" signage. The textured sidewalk chalkboard enables users to reuse the board over and over again, as the writing surface can be easily cleaned using a damp cloth. Top hinges can be found at the top of the a-frame black board, enabling users to fold the unit flat for easy storage and transport. This sidewalk chalkboard is constructed from rubber wood and feature a black-colored finish. This neutral coloring enables the chalkboard to blend in with virtually any indoor location. This sidewalk chalkboard that is made from rubber wood is designed for use indoors. These units can also be used outdoors, but with limitations (under fair weather conditions only). Businesses can increase sales and customer interest simply by placing these sidewalk chalkboard units in highly visible locations, such as storefronts and entryways.
